snippet: The company is starting its own line of diapers and baby wipes exclusively for its Prime members to get more shoppers to sign up for the $99 annual program.
abstract: Amazon is starting Amazon Elements, its own line of diapers and baby wipes exclusively for its Prime Member to get more shoppers to sign up for $99 annual program.
lead_paragraph: The company is starting its own line of diapers and baby wipes exclusively for its Prime members to get more shoppers to sign up for the $99 annual program.

headline.main: Amazon Enters New Field: Diapers and Baby Wipes
headline.print_headline: Amazon Enters New Field: Diapers and Baby Wipes
